action.content:
Provide one single-word clue that relates to some of your team's words from the list below. You can choose to how many and to which words your clue relates to.
The goal is to have your partner guess all of your team's words based on the clues you give them, before the other team has uncovered all of theirs. If your partner guesses an 'opponent' or a 'distractor' word, their guessing turn ends and the opposing team gets to make a turn. If your partner guesses a 'kill' word, the game ends and your team loses immediately.
The more words your clue relates to, the quicker you can win the game, but the harder the associations may be to guess for your partner, so choose your clue word wisely. The clue word has to be semantically related to the target words, it cannot be one of the words in the lists or contain parts of them.

Always give your single-word clue and your comma-separated list of related target words in the following format and make your answers as short as possible, never include any other text than is required in this form:

CLUE: <WORD>
TARGETS: <TARGETS>

Your team words are: lawyer, bar, sense, tv, past, gun, history, haven, life.
Your opponent's team words are: team, king, case, star, trouble, brother, dinner, moment.
Distractor words are: hell, future, party, present, afternoon, boss, message.
The kill words are: bit.

CLUE: Education
TARGETS: lawyer, bar, sense, tv, history, life
education

Provide a comma-separated list of up to 6 words from the following list that best relate or are most closely associated with the word 'education'. Always start your list of guess(es) with 'GUESS: ' and do not include any other text in your answer.

present, life, case, brother, moment, tv, lawyer, gun, future, history, trouble, sense, haven, team, star, king, afternoon, past, hell, party, bit, dinner, bar, message, boss
GUESS: future, history, life, past, lawyer, sense
future

The word future was guessed but is an innocent word. Your teammate's turn ended there.
Now provide another clue relating to some of your remaining team words and a list of the related target words. Remember to start your clue with 'CLUE: ', put a new line, and start your comma-separated list of target words with 'TARGETS: '. Notice: some words have been removed from the lists compared to previous requests.

Your remaining team words are: lawyer, bar, sense, tv, past, gun, history, haven, life.
Remaining words for your opponent are: team, king, case, star, trouble, brother, dinner, moment.
Remaining distractor words are: hell, party, present, afternoon, boss, message.
Remaining kill words are: bit.

CLUE: protection
TARGETS: gun, haven, life
protection

The word future was guessed but is an innocent word. Your turn ended there.
Now provide another comma-separated list of at least 1 and up to 3 words from the following list of words that best relate or are most closely associated with the word 'protection'. Remember to start your answer with 'GUESS: '. Notice: some words have been removed from the list compared to previous requests.

present, life, case, brother, moment, tv, lawyer, gun, history, trouble, sense, haven, team, star, afternoon, past, hell, party, bit, dinner, bar, message, boss
GUESS: gun, haven, lawyer

The words gun, haven, lawyer were guessed correctly. Your teammate's turn ended there.
Now provide another clue relating to some of your remaining team words and a list of the related target words. Remember to start your clue with 'CLUE: ', put a new line, and start your comma-separated list of target words with 'TARGETS: '. Notice: some words have been removed from the lists compared to previous requests.

Your remaining team words are: bar, sense, tv, past, history, life.
Remaining words for your opponent are: team, case, star, trouble, brother, dinner, moment.
Remaining distractor words are: hell, party, present, afternoon, boss, message.
Remaining kill words are: bit.

CLUE: show
TARGETS: bar, tv, sense, history, life
show

The words gun, haven, lawyer were guessed correctly. Your turn ended there.
Now provide another comma-separated list of at least 1 and up to 5 words from the following list of words that best relate or are most closely associated with the word 'show'. Remember to start your answer with 'GUESS: '. Notice: some words have been removed from the list compared to previous requests.

present, life, case, brother, moment, tv, history, sense, team, star, afternoon, past, hell, party, bit, dinner, bar, message, boss
GUESS: tv, star, bit, party, afternoon
star

The word tv was guessed correctly. The word star was guessed but is an opponent word. Your teammate's turn ended there.
Now provide another clue relating to some of your remaining team words and a list of the related target words. Remember to start your clue with 'CLUE: ', put a new line, and start your comma-separated list of target words with 'TARGETS: '. Notice: some words have been removed from the lists compared to previous requests.

Your remaining team words are: bar, sense, past, history, life.
Remaining words for your opponent are: team, case, brother, dinner, moment.
Remaining distractor words are: hell, party, present, afternoon, boss, message.
Remaining kill words are: bit.

CLUE: reflection
TARGETS: past, history, sense, life
reflection

The word tv was guessed correctly. The word star was guessed but is an opponent word. Your turn ended there.
Now provide another comma-separated list of at least 1 and up to 4 words from the following list of words that best relate or are most closely associated with the word 'reflection'. Remember to start your answer with 'GUESS: '. Notice: some words have been removed from the list compared to previous requests.

present, life, case, brother, history, sense, team, afternoon, past, hell, party, bit, dinner, bar, message, boss
GUESS: past, sense, life, history

The words past, sense, life, history were guessed correctly. Your teammate's turn ended there.
Now provide another clue relating to some of your remaining team words and a list of the related target words. Remember to start your clue with 'CLUE: ', put a new line, and start your comma-separated list of target words with 'TARGETS: '. Notice: some words have been removed from the lists compared to previous requests.

Your remaining team words are: bar.
Remaining words for your opponent are: team, case, brother, dinner.
Remaining distractor words are: hell, party, present, afternoon, boss, message.
Remaining kill words are: bit.

CLUE: pub
TARGETS: bar
pub

The words past, sense, life, history were guessed correctly. Your turn ended there.
Now provide another comma-separated list of at least 1 and up to 1 words from the following list of words that best relate or are most closely associated with the word 'pub'. Remember to start your answer with 'GUESS: '. Notice: some words have been removed from the list compared to previous requests.

present, case, team, afternoon, hell, party, bit, dinner, bar, message, boss
GUESS: bar
